display_long_description:
# Start Your Wizard Journey

**War of Wizards: Apprentice Edition** invites you into a magical VR world where you draw spells to fight in exciting arena battles.

Start with **1v1 duels** and **PVE mode**, easy to pick up and fun to play

You can upgrade to the full version to unlock **2v2 battles**, **PK mode**, and **more starting spells** through in-game purchases.

# Drawing-Based Spell Casting

With over 80 spells to learn, casting magic is all about drawing the right symbol.

The system instantly recognizes your gesture and casts the spell.
Visual guides help you get started quickly.
Focus on timing, accuracy, and strategy.
[media]
# Epic Magic Battles, Strategic PVP & PVE

Dive into intense magical combat where every decision matters! 

Challenge real players in 1v1 or 2v2 PVP, or battle AI opponents in PVE. 

With real-time matchmaking and evolving strategies, every duel feels fresh. 

Customize your spell deck.Master your timing.Outplay your enemies in every match.
[media]
# Key Features:

* Fast-paced tower defense requiring strategy, quick reflexes, and timing
* Over 80 unique spells cast by drawing, with power based on accuracy and size
* Visual prompts for easier learning and tactical focus
* Balanced spell design supporting diverse strategies
* 1v1 and 2v2 PVP, solo or co-op PVE, matchmaking with friends or strangers
